Key Match Events: Zac Gallen struck out a season-high 11 batters in six dominant innings.
Pavin Smith hit a pinch-hit, three-run homer in the eighth inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Diamondbacks broke a three-game losing streak with an 8-2 victory over the Giants.
The D-backs' lead over the Braves in the NL Wild Card chase was hanging by a thread.
Gallen's final line was 6 innings, 2 hits, 2 walks, and 11 strikeouts.
The D-backs' record improved to 88-71, while the idle Atlanta Braves are 86-71 and the Mets are 87-70.
